text:
Same here. The whole game being in a tower was ok to me since it was an absurdly large tower. Bosses and music were same quality or a little better IMO. I felt a lot more invested in the story for all three characters too, maybe since they could talk (nothing against Adol or anything, but... still).

Still, both games are awesome, and their soundtracks are top notch.

author: Ash Williams

text: This is my fav from Ys series, glad it eventually made the list
author: Ash Williams

text: I much prefered Ys Oath in Felghana's 12 hours campaign than this game's 3x8 hours campaign. While each of the 3 characters have a unique fighting style, it ended up being way too redundant since their campaigns are mostly the same except for a couple bosses and the story. It's inferior to Oath in almost every way (the bosses, the music, the fact that you play the whole game inside a tower, etc.). Still, this series' battle system is as fun as ever. Good game, but not on Oath's level.
author: SupraDarky
